hudson.tasks.Shell.command: cd /mnt cp /mnt/image.img /mnt/image.vmdk.img sudo /opt/vappio-util/img_clean.sh /mnt/image.vmdk.img /opt/vappio-util/cleanupimg wget -P /mnt http://cb2.igs.umaryland.edu/vmware-tools.8.4.2.kernel.2.6.32-21-server.tgz /opt/vappio-util/img_add_tgz.sh /mnt/image.vmware.img /mnt/vmware-tools.8.4.2.kernel.2.6.32-21-server.tgz wget -P /mnt http://cb2.igs.umaryland.edu/vboxtools-3.2.6.tar.gz /opt/vappio-util/img_add_tgz.sh /mnt/image.vmware.img /mnt/vmware-tools.8.4.2.kernel.2.6.32-21-server.tgz wget -P /mnt http://cb2.igs.umaryland.edu/grub-boot.tgz sudo /opt/vappio-util/img_to_vmdk.sh /mnt/image.vmdk.img /mnt/grub-boot.tgz /mnt/image.vmdk
